content.prompt: Which of the following is an accurate comparison of the two sources’ arguments?

choices.label: Raudot wants the state to intervene on behalf of increasing workers’ wages, whereas the weavers do not want the state to intervene.
Raudot does not want the state to intervene on behalf of increasing workers’ wages, whereas the weavers do want the state to intervene.
Raudot and the weavers both want the state to intervene to increase workers’ wages.
Neither Raudot nor the weavers want the state to intervene to increase workers’ wages.

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Compare the arguments or main ideas of two sources.
